setting.name: Component Renderer
setting.description: The render for this kind of component. The value must correspond with a RPM method written for this specific renderer.

setting.name: Source Editor
setting.description: The editor the source text comes from.

setting.name: Alternate Source Path
setting.description: This is an alternate path to component type specific source files. If an unknown editor is being used or if the source needs to come from outside the editing environment. This setting will override automated source path routines. Beware, this setting may be localized only and will not work on other systems.

setting.name: Preprocess Script
setting.description: The name of a script (only one) that will be used for preprocessing this type of component.

setting.name: Post Process Scripts
setting.description: A list of a scripts that can be used for a varity of postprocessing on this type of component.
